title: SAMSUNG Galaxy F22 (Denim Blue, 64 GB)  (4 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Adaptor (15W), Charging Cable, Sim Ejector Pin, User Manual
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Quad Rear Camera Setup: 48MP + 8MP + 2MP + 2MP, Features: Night Mode, Ultra wide, Depth and Macro
product_specification.Sensors: Accelerometer, Fingerprint Sensor, Gyro Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, Virtual Light Sensor, Virtual Proximity Sensor
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty Provided by the Manufacturer from Date of Purchase

product_description.90 Hz Refresh Rate: The Samsung Galaxy F22 smartphone comes with an HD+ sAMOLED display, which delivers rich and vivid visuals, irrespective of the content you're watching. Also, you can enjoy a smooth scrolling experience with minimal motion blur, thanks to the 90 Hz refresh rate.
product_description.6000 mAh Battery: Go an entire day without having to constantly recharge this smartphone as it comes with a 6000 mAh battery.
product_description.48 MP Camera Setup: Every photo that you capture and every video that you record on this Samsung smartphone will be clear and realistic, thanks to the True 48 MP quad-rear camera setup.
product_description.Powerful Processor: You can enjoy smooth performance and seamless multitasking capabilities as this smartphone is equipped with an MTK G80 processor.
product_description.Smooth OS: You can enjoy a smooth user experience, be it while scrolling or browsing for apps as this smartphone runs on OneUI Core 3.1 (based on Android 11).
product_description.Safety Features: You can unlock this smartphone quickly and safely without having to mug up complex passwords, thanks to the Fast Face Unlock and Fingerprint Scanner options.
product_description.Samsung Pay Mini: Make payments to various establishments quickly and safely, thanks to the Samsung Pay Mini feature.
product_description.Stylish Design: The stylish and trendy design of this smartphone lets you flaunt this smartphone with pride in front of your friends and colleagues.

review: Nice battery backup, good camera and also a good display. For daily use phone is smooth and perfect.

I got the product at my door step in 16 hours after ordering so thank you flipkart for this excellent delivery. I have used it for 3 days and now writing my review:
Pro:
1. Battery is brilliant and perfect for people who spent lot of time on multimedia
2. Display 90hrz is very smooth and good looking. Didn't feel the absence of Full HD actually better than full HD IPS displays.
3. Samsung One UI
4. Look & feel. Very comfortable to hold. Background Matt finish no fingerprint
5. Primary camera is good if not great for this price.
I am adding some samples. Front camera is also very good.
6. No heating problem even after heavy gaming. G80 optimization is better than expected.

Cons:
1. No 4k video support. EIS is not upto the mark in video recording
2. This phone is not for people who likes to play big games

I will say I am in a winning situation after the purchase of the phone based on the price. According to my needs it's comfortable, nice display, good camera and fantastic battery. If these are your requirements then go for it. You will not be disappointed.

Pros

Cons

3) G80 Processor (G95 would have been better)
4) 15 W charger in the box. (25 W charger needed in the box as it supports 25 W charger)
5) Lags in High-end gaming. Good for casual & normal graphics gaming.

Good Budget Phone overall if you are ok with the Cons.

I am writing this review after using a month. Camera quality is good as per this range. Both front camera and back camera performs well. Fingerprint sensor is not up to the mark. I have already used J8 of Samsung which was better as compared to f22 for fingerprint. Battery back up is decent. It will provide a full day battery back up if you do web surfing. I am not a pubg or other game user. So I can't tell about how it works when u play games. Display is good but touch screen is not that good specially when you want to receive a call touchscreen doesn't perform well. You have to swipe at least 2 times and put pressure to take the call. During the call there is no problem regarding volume or quality of call. Charging is not so fast. I did not feel any heating issue till now. No issue regarding mobile network. The worst part of the mobile is during the call , the sensor doesn't works well. Screen becomes active and screen light gets on.Within a month the phone starts to hang and worst experience is during a call all the touch became non active or dead. Then I had to restart the phone by pressing the power button and volume low button together for 15 to 20 seconds. I will give a 0.5 out of 5 for this mobile.

though it is so called super amoled screen but it is worst screen quality I have ever used, because of the 274 PPI which makes it pathetic to use as pixels are visible while watching videos or generally using phone. You can see the blurry edges of menu Icons on screen. Sim tray is so fragile that I almost broke it while inserting into the slot ( nokia provides the best quality hardware....only hardware). The only good thing happened with this purchase is delivery by Flipkart.

Using last 15 days, regularly 6-9 hours in verious purposes but game. It's performance good, display good, not a mobile game lover so can't tell performance during gaming. Full charge battery last upto 36 hours as I use above mentioned.
Cons: 4g processor, if u download low signal area device heat up quite,
Same issue during charging, it concern for processor health, 15 watt adapter wr provided, take around 160mins 0 to 100.

Pros:
1) Battery - It almost gives 2 complete days of moderate to high usage.
2) Display - AMOLED display is good. HD and 4K content plays without much compromise in video clarity.
3) Call Quality - Good
4) Signal Reception - Good
5) Call recording without announcement.

Cons:
1) Low audio - Mono speaker. It's hardly audible in a moderately noisy environment.
2) Camera - Don't get this phone for the camera. Both front and back camera - Not good.
3) Wifi Calling - Lot of disturbance in the call. I turned off the wifi calling.
4) AOD (Always on Display) - AOD is available but there is no option to increase the brightness. By default, the AOD is very dull in lighting.
5) Samsung Apps and Bloatware - This one can be maximum avoided if you take certain steps while initializing the mobile for the first time.

Amazing battery life on this phone. The only con that I have found is the HD+ resolution when Samsung is providing full HD+ panel at this same price of 13k on the m21. The HD+ super amoled display on this phone doesn't look bad though... yes, the pixel density is less and it can be seen but the colours and contrast stand out while consuming less battery. I paid 13k for a phone that doesn't support carrier integration and comes with HD resolution only but the user experience is surprisingly good so far. The phone is lightweight, OneUI has beautiful customisation options, camera is good, audio output on my headphone is clean and loud. I don't play games on my phone, so the performance is satisfactory even with the mediatek g80. This phone comes with Knox security and the interface feels well thought out and polished.

Writing up this review based on one month's usage.
This is actually a great device at its price point.

Display: An entry level AMOLED screen. Even though at 720P it's a delight. Nits are on the lower side; that means visibility on direct sun light is on the interior side.
AMOLED screen at a lower budget is undeniably it's USP.

Battery: The 6000 mAH would easily last a 2 days on Medium-Heavy usage.
Charging time is around 2hr 15mins with the 15W in the box charger.

Camera: Camera is surprisingly good; I actually thought it would be a mediocre one
But it performs very well. Colors are good, low light conditions are fairly well

Performance: It would certainly Carry your day to day tasks at ease.
The Helio G80 is a great improvement over the outgoing Exynox chipsets
On Gaming, I haven't played any much games ; but Installed and rendered few heavy games; and it works fine.

One down side I felt is the audio quality.

Writing this review only for those who are planning to but this phone.

Writing it pointwise so that it will be easy to understand.


1.BATTERY:- This phones battery is excellent (no competition) even it last longer than Samsung F62's 7000mAh battery.

2.CAMERA:- Camera is good but still not upto the marks, it could have been little better.

3.DISPLAY :- Very Good, even better than FHD screens, it helps in battery performance.

4.LOOKS & COMFORT :- Very easy to use & comfortable to hold.

5.HEATING:- It does hit little bit after heavy gaming for long time but gets cool very quickly. So heating is not an issue in my opinion.

6.SOUND QUALITY:- My previous phone has dual full time Dolby Atmos speakers so if comparing with that phone speakers are decent.

7.CHARGING:- I think Samsung should write 20W on charger because is too fast for what they call it 15W.Charging Speed Surprised me.

8.COLOUR :- I ordered a black color phone but I received the phone in the sort of greenish color although it looks like black but it is not exactly black.

*OVERALL EXPERIENCE*

6-Thanks for auto call record option.
7-Performance is good, better for normal use, multimedia experience is good, you can play heavy games in low settings.
8-Single speaker sound quality is good but could be better.
9-Design is good premium feel plastic back little bulky no problem to hold in hand.
10-I have seen some aids it not good but you can disable them.
